skortekaas.PGPDetachedFileSign

Class program

  • java.lang.Object
    • skortekaas.PGPDetachedFileSign.program

  • public class program
extends java.lang.Object
    This application creates an PGP armor detached sign for every file that is in the same directory as the .jar file
    Since:
    22-06-2015
    Author:
    Sven Kortekaas - https://github.com/SvenKortekaas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      program() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static java.io.File[] getFileList(java.io.File directory)
      The method returns the file list of the given directory in a File arry
      private static int getListStringSize(java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileList)
      This method gives you the number as an integer of items in a List
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> makeFileList(java.io.File directory)
      Gets all the files from a directory and puts it in a List and returns it
      private static void signer(java.io.File directory, java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileList)
      This method opens CMD.exe sets the path to the location of the .JAR and uses 'gpg --detach-sign --armor [file]' for every file there is in the directory

      • makeFileList

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> makeFileList(java.io.File directory)
        Gets all the files from a directory and puts it in a List and returns it
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory for the file list
        Returns:
        returns the list with files

      • signer

        private static void signer(java.io.File directory,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileList)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method opens CMD.exe sets the path to the location of the .JAR and uses 'gpg --detach-sign --armor [file]' for every file there is in the directory
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory where the .JAR is in
        fileList - the files that need to get signed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException for ProcessBuilder, BufferedReader and InputStreamReader

      • getFileList

        private static java.io.File[] getFileList(java.io.File directory)
        The method returns the file list of the given directory in a File arry
        Parameters:
        directory - give the directory for the file list
        Returns:
        the list of files as a File arry

      • getListStringSize

        private static int getListStringSize(java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileList)
        This method gives you the number as an integer of items in a List
        Parameters:
        fileList - the list in List
        Returns:
        the size of the given List as an integer
